cast.name: 内菲莉· 库利 Nefeli Kouri

introduction: Elizabeth is a young cadet nun, who was entered at a very young age in a monastery. Her course is prescribed until an earthquake causes serious damage to the monastery and its abbot asks her to return to her home for a while until the restoration works are completed. As long as her stay in her home country, her half-sister will celebrate her birthday with a party with many guests. There she will meet for the first time with Peter and the spark that will light will lead to a strong love. Peter will not be convinced by Elizabeth's arguments that their relationship is impossible to proceed and he will chase her to the monastery. This love is going to put the young nun into a dilemma: to follow her heart and fall in love or remain in the choice of monastic life?摘自imdb
